reviews.text: I couldn’t be happier with my experience with Domenick and The Blind King. Setting a consultation was easy and Domenick arrived right on time. We discussed my ideas and he provided great expertise in guiding me through the project. He was extremely knowledgeable and a pleasure to work with. We placed the order that day and the project arrived in advance of the 3-4 week timeframe, which was a terrific bonus.  Installation was very smooth, and the result was exactly what I had hoped for. Domenick
Dominique was super friendly, provided feedback when helping me choose my color.  He was able to install the blinds quickly and the job was completed with no issues.

Wonderful experience!  Took a bit longer for special fittings of a couple windows, but thrilled with the results! Highly recommend the plantation shutters! They are classy and help the house cooler this summer!  Joey was very kind and helpful with designs, efficiency of install, and company.  He’s a hard worker and the results really show. Thank you for helping make our house , our home.

I recently had custom blinds installed and the entire experience was top-notch from start to finish.  Domenick and his team were incredibly professional, knowledgeable, and courteous. They helped me choose the perfect style and fit.

What stood out most was their attention to detail during installation. They worked efficiently, cleaned up after themselves, and made sure everything was functioning perfectly before leaving. Communication was also great throughout the process, and the blinds were d

I recently had blinds installed in my master bathroom after planning for them over four years. I couldn't ever seem to find the right type of blind for the right price. When Domenick visited my house he had an amazing eye for style and made me feel confident he could solve my difficult installation challenges. He listened to what I was looking for and immediately picked out some perfect options. Domenick was extremely professional and checked up on me throughout the ordering and installation pro

Domenick was great to work with. The drapes look amazing. If I need any other window coverings, I will definitely call the Blind King.
I highly recommend him.
Timely, polite  and professional. This is my 3rd house to use Blind King. Highly recommend!

I am extremely happy I chose the Blind King! During my consult, all of my questions were answered and I was given help choosing the best blind option for my home. After my blinds were ordered, I was updated throughout the entire process and install was quick and efficient. I love my new blinds and cannot recommend enough!

I recently worked with Domenick on an installation and the entire process was incredibly easy. Everything went smoothly from start to finish. I’m really happy with how it turned out and am grateful it was so simple!

My representative Dominic was very wonderful to work with. He helped me find the right product and even returned to do the installation, which was perfectly completed.  He was professional, and very cheerful.

I would highly recommend the blind king! Great customer service, friendly and professional!
The installer did a great job! Quick, efficient and polite!
Job well done!
Absolutely beautiful. High quality service start to finish.

We were satisfied with our sheer blinds that put on by the installer. Joey did a great job. Very nice and if theres any problem we could always reach out to him and to their office as well. I highly recommend their service.

I contacted Jeff for assistance with my new home, he was very professional, listened to my input and provided a great plan. Additionally, each of the products were delivered as planned (no issues) and the installation team did a fantastic job.  I am very satisfied with the solution and value:  sheer blinds and sheer shutter blinds. nd

Domenick was very thorough during the entire process, did a great job explaining everything during the consultation meeting, and gave us a great deal. Joey installed the jobs for us and did a great job as well. I highly recommend The Blind King.

We recently worked with the blind king to get some roller shades installed in a tricky area of our home. The blind king was very responsive and professional taking the time to make sure we were happy with the product. The installation was seamless and took very little time. I highly recommend going with them for your window treatment needs!
Blinds were delivered quickly and are beautiful! Highly recommend.

Joey is great and provided exceptional services for my entire new house window blind project throughout the house. He is very friendly, professional and patient with my various window blind selection requests. Highly recommend Blind King. Elizabeth is wonderful in help scheduling the project installation. Thanks!

My experience was simply awesome. The entire staff is very professional. Katherine, owner, was so informative and personable at the initial in-home estimate. My roman shades and tie backs were installed recently. Love them! I will become a recurring customer.
J. Holmes
We love our blinds! We've used The Blind King twice now to take care of all the windows in our new home. We've been so pleased with the results. Thanks!

A phenomenal job. The Blind King installed over 50 plantation shutters in our house. It was clear to us that The Blind King's 5-star rating is well-deserved. Candice measured multiple times and reviewed the options prior to ordering. She consulted with Joey from the install team to ensure the shutter configuration she intended to order would work. Joey even came by and installed temporary shades on our windows until the shutters arrived. Joey came back and installed the plantation shutters when

I had an excellent experience with both Joey and Domenick. We have an older home that had existing shutters and I was nervous about how replacement shutters would look. However, Domenick guided me through the design and option selection process. Install was a breeze and we are so satisfied with our product! I highly recommend The Bling King if you are considering new window treatments.

The Blind King - Norman blinds: From start to finish this company is professional and responds quickly. Joey came out and measured, made suggestions and definitely did not try to upsell us. Joey also did the installation which was blink of the eye quick for 20 windows. One thing I really like is the valance over the windows/blinds which looks classy. I highly recommend The Blind King.

Fantastic experience with The Blind King.  Joey was fantastic presenting all the options and then installing the blinds when they arrived.  Difficult installation as one large window was 20 ft high in our living room, but was not a problem for Joey.  Office support staff was fantastic following up on the order and keeping me informed.  Very reasonably priced as well.  Will certainly be doing more business with them.

On a non scheduled note I had to replace some  blinds that were destroyed by our over zealous dog. "SQUIRREL!!" In the backyard. I called Blind King and had an indivudual out in no time at all with a bid and time of delivery. All in all they were great to work with, reasonable, and problem free. I will call on them again in the future.
Beautiful work. Professional. Timely. I love it.

Wow. Just a great experience from start to finish. A very professional business with an easy going and thorough consultation, reasonable cost,  flawless installation, and a stunning finished product! You will NOT be disappointed using this company for beautiful blinds. Your home/business will thank you.

Outstanding service from beginning to end! Professional, clean, reliable and efficient. Joey did a perfect job with the measurements and install. Also, the blinds were made and ready to install way ahead of schedule and look great.

We are very happy with our Blind King shades and the excellent service provided by their scheduler, Elizabeth and installer, Joey Moore. We purchased the Top Down Bottom Up shade and the ability to have the Bottom Up feature was perfect for our need to have privacy and still have an outside view from our enclosed terrace. Mary Y.

Thank you for taking care of my guest room curtain rod. Sales lady Candice was very nice and professional as was your service man. If your product performs as expected I will definitely recommend you.

I researched and was recommended the Blind King from a friend. We decided to schedule a free consultation and see if it was within our budget to get all new blinds. Jeff, was early, professional and gave us a quote right away. We were able to get the blinds installed less than two weeks from our ordering date. We went with the faux wood blinds in pure white. The installation was seamless and our place looks so much better. I recommend to anyone who needs blinds or needs an upgrade. Worth it. I o

First Class company. Jeff is very professional. We purchased commercial shades and the product and installation are top notch. I have and will continue to recommend Blind King to anyone I know looking for blinds, shades or shutters. A+

Jeff King and the Blind King team provided outstanding guidance in selecting the plantation shutters for our new home. It was a pleasure working with Jeff in all aspects of the project - from scheduling the initial meeting at the home, determining the style, brand and size, confirming measurements and final installation. We have 22 windows of different sizes with both internal and external installation styles and all fit perfectly.  We are extremely pleased with the Norman 4.5" wood shutters and

I had the blind king install a custom roller blind on my back door and they did a great job! During the initial consult, they clearly laid out all of my options, made suggestions when I asked and did not try to pressure me into buying any additional features that I did not want. This team was great to work with, the install was quick and the price was fair. I now have a beautiful blind that looks great and blocks out the excess light from my living room. I would highly recommend this company!
Domenick is a superstar.  He added blinds to our office difficult-to-get-to windows!

I didn't actually complete my purchase with Jeff at Blind King, but I wanted to leave a review because of the great customer service I received. Jeff was quick and easy to work with, personable, and never made me feel bad about having him write up my quote several different ways with different options. I appreciated how patient he was and not once did I feel pressured into buying anything I wasn't comfortable with. I think that's hard to come by in the services industry, and it stood out to me.

It has been a pleasure working with everyone at the Blind King. Jeff and Katherine were so helpful with picking the right type and color blinds for our windows.  Andrew came out to install them and he did such a wonderful job.  We could not be more happy with the whole process from the initial phone call through the installation. We love our new window treatments! This is a company that cares about their customers and is helpful every step of the way.  We highly recommend The Blind King!
Easy to work with, professional. Great selection and we chose window treatments perfect for our home. Fast and accurate installation.

From order to install The Blind King has been professional, accurate and efficient.  Andrew Loose and David Brown did a great install, quickly on 12 windows and a kitchen door! If I had more windows to cover - I would definitely use them again - the price is affordable, the service was great and the blinds are beautiful!

The Blind King installed beautiful solar shades in our office!  The installation by Caleb was seamless, professional and provided us with exactly what we had hoped for.  Jeff King is top-notch in service and competitive pricing.  This is a business you need to put at the top of your list!

Used Blind King for 15 windows in our Fairmount home - mix of plantation shutters, honeycomb shades, and solar shades.  Installation was very professional, left no mess behind.  Everything looks great.  Jeff was very helpful in thinking through the options.  Would highly recommend!

We purchased blinds from the Blind King last year. One of them had a problem with one of the strings recently. I called them and left a message, they returned my message the same day and scheduled a meeting the next day. BL will replace the blind. They have a lifetime warranty with the original purchaser.

I appreciate they send appointment emails that I can add to my calendar and reminders.

The Blind King was very responsive and professional. They came to our home within just a few days from w

I had to get some blackout shades for my Mom's room at an assisted living facility. The Blind King was wonderful to work with start to finish. Andrew came out and measured, and we decided on the right shades. Mike did the installation, and it was perfect! I'm very pleased with the work performed by The Blind King.

Working with BLIND KING was a great experience.  Designer was very helpful choosing my blind and drape selections.
Install was great!
I would highly recommend.
I look forward to working with Katherine in the future.

Jeff was incredibly helpful and responsive and patiently helped walk us through all of the options in planning and selecting the best solutions  for our office space, at substantially less cost than all other quotes we received for comparable products. And Andrew did a great install! Overall, we're extremely pleased with the whole experience.

We took quotes from 4 window treatment companies. The Blind King was our vendor of choice. The product selection, price and design consultation were driving factors in our decision. The installation and follow up was exceptional. Bonus points for the easy online scheduling.
Great job!! 3 sets of blinds - all beautiful. Domineck and everyone in the office nice, helpful and professional. Highly recommend.

Jeff and his wife, the owners,  were awesome to work with. They came to my home with samples for Roman shades and plantation wood shutters. They are so knowledgeable and helped me make the right choices for my windows. I highly recommend this company for window treatments. I would definitely use them again.

Very diligent in explaining all of my options and took the time to assist along the way and kept me up to date on custom delivery status.  Even had a change of plans due to builder redesigning the floor plan after orders were placed.  Jeff was able to re-purpose the custom shutters on other windows.  On day of install - it was very efficient, professional and the end product looks wonderful.

Great product and price.  Jeff (owner) is very honest and good patience with anything what you need for your windows. I had him and his crew put up 15 plantation shutters for large windows in my house and the shutters look flawless.
